mapper.sql: II_NO, OPER_ADMIN, ISSUE_DATE, RECEIVE_ORG, RECEIVE_MANAGER, RECEIVE_DATE, SEND_ORG, SEND_DATE, STATUS
mapper.insert:
insert into ITEM_ISSUE
II_NO,
OPER_ADMIN,
ISSUE_DATE,
RECEIVE_ORG,
RECEIVE_MANAGER,
RECEIVE_DATE,
SEND_ORG,
SEND_DATE,
STATUS,
#{iiNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{operAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{receiveOrg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{receiveManager,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update ITEM_ISSUE
OPER_ADMIN = #{operAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISSUE_DATE = #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECEIVE_ORG = #{receiveOrg,jdbcType=CHAR},
RECEIVE_MANAGER = #{receiveManager,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECEIVE_DATE = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SEND_ORG = #{sendOrg,jdbcType=CHAR},
SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where II_NO = #{iiNo,jdbcType=CHAR}

update ITEM_ISSUE set OPER_ADMIN = #{operAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISSUE_DATE = #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECEIVE_ORG = #{receiveOrg,jdbcType=CHAR}, RECEIVE_MANAGER = #{receiveManager,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECEIVE_DATE = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEND_ORG = #{sendOrg,jdbcType=CHAR}, SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where II_NO = #{iiNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
